Lack enough support: The claim lacks any corroborating information such as date, time, or location, and there is no actual video provided.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Kayla McKelvey is a co-founder of the Black Lives Matter movement, but there is no information to substantiate this claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the incident depicted in the video actually occurred in China and had nothing to do with the Black Lives Matter movement.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that McKelvey defected on an ice rink because "only white people ice skate," which is not supported by any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the rumor was deliberately created to advance an untruth likely to generate viral traffic.
